metadata.title: CVE-2019-19553 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In Wireshark 3.0.0 to 3.0.6 and 2.6.0 to 2.6.12, the CMS dissector couldcrash. This was addressed in epan/dissectors/asn1/cms/packet-cms-template.cby ensuring that an object identifier is set to NULL after a ContentInfodissection.

criterions.comment: wireshark: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
